title: Zoe for IP instead of BE
body:
Its BE now but in the home section it says that Zoe costs 7800 IP. LOL fix that

IGN: CrazyNinjaGame
Server:Eune

replies.body: Yeeeaaaaa looks like the person who was putting her in the shop might have forgotten about that change xD! I was able to login about an hour ago and saw her for BE, are you still seeing IP if you refresh your store?
